verse.name: c1
verse.lines:
The move is on, my Lord,
the move is on;
The move is on, my Lord,
the move is on.
I can hear the rustle
in the mulberry trees,
and I know, I know, I know
the move is on.

verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
Move on brother,
move on sister,
this is the moving day.
Move a little closer,
where the streams are flowing,
move on brother, move on.
